divs: sighting detailsme and another person were standing outside of jefferson college in arnold, missouri. i pointed out the satellite that i see most nights from my backyard and mentioned how you can see a faint blinking of red and blue lights. to our right we noticed a very large yellowish\off-white lighted object. it was rectangular in shape only it didn't have sharp corners. it wasn't too high and it wasn't too far. it was a clear night and there was plenty of distance around it in every direction of empty sky. it was very slowly moving in a straight line. we looked at each other and tried to figure out if it could be a comet or meteor but we concluded that the object had no tail like a meteor would have. maybe 10-15 seconds went by, i looked back up and it was gone!!!! it was just gone. we freaked!!! the only reference i can give to explain the size and shape of it is the size of a cigarette butt if you are holding in in front of you--that big only in the freakin sky!!! it was amazing. i hope others seen it and perhaps got some footage cuz i would really love to see it. i don't know how long it was there before we noticed it. i have waited forever to see evidence for myself and this was real. i have always believed, but i just needed to see. thanks
Summary: low and unusually large off-white yellowish light slowly moving in clear sky, then disappeared
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Arnold
There was one other sighting in Arnold on or around April 2nd 2012
